mapper.select: select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_CMDBMD_CUSTOMCOL_TABLE.NEXTVAL AS "id" from dual
select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_CMDBMD_PAGEFIELD_TABLE.NEXTVAL AS "id" from dual
select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_CMDBMD_MANAGE.NEXTVAL AS "modelId" from dual
SELECT NVL(max("model_sort"),'0') "modelSort" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_group_id" = #{modelGroupId} and "delete_flag" = '0';

select
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "model_name" = #{modelName} OR instr( ',' || ( SELECT "pids" FROM "mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_name" = #{modelName}) || ',', ',' || "model_id" || ',' ) > 0

SELECT a."model_id" AS "modelId", a."model_index" AS "modelIndex", a."model_name" AS "modelName" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations" b LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" a ON a."model_id" = b."opposite_model_id" WHERE a."model_type_id" = '1' AND a."delete_flag" = '0' AND b."delete_flag" = '0' and b."own_model_id" = #{modelId} ORDER BY a."model_id"

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,0,%' AND "model_level" = '0' AND "is_show" = '1' And "delete_flag" = '0'

select distinct "relation_id", "relation_name", a."model_name" as "leftModelName", c."model_name" as "rightModelName", a."model_index" as "leftModelIndex", c."model_index" as "rightModelIndex", a."model_icon" as "leftModelIcon", c."model_icon" as "rightModelIcon", b."left_model_id" , b."right_model_id", b."left_relation_group_id", b."right_relation_group_id", b."left_relation", b."right_relation", d."relation_group_name" as "leftRelationGroupName", e."relation_group_name" as "rightRelationGroupName", a."creator" , a."create_date" , a."modifier" , a."modification_date" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations" b on a."model_id"=b."left_model_id" left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" c on c."model_id"=b."right_model_id" left join (select "relation_group_id","relation_group_name" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations_group" where "delete_flag"='0' ) d on b."left_relation_group_id"=d."relation_group_id" left join (select "relation_group_id","relation_group_name" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations_group" where "delete_flag"='0' ) e on b."right_relation_group_id"=e."relation_group_id"
where a."delete_flag"='0' and b."delete_flag"='0' and c."delete_flag"='0' and (b."left_model_id"= #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} or b."right_model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select "relation_group_id","relation_group_name","relation_group_desc","creator","create_date","modifier","modification_date" from ${TBSNAME}"mw_cmdbmd_relations_group" where "delete_flag"='0' and "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "model_id" in
#{item}

SELECT a."index_id" AS "propertiesIndexId", a."properties_name" AS "propertiesName", a."properties_type_id" AS "propertiesType", (select c."model_index" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" c where c."model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) AS "modelIndexId", (select c."model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" c where c."model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) AS "modelId", a."is_read" AS "isRead", a."is_must" AS "isMust", a."is_only" AS "isOnly", a."is_show" AS "isShow", CASE WHEN (a."properties_type_id" = '1' or a."properties_type_id" = '7') THEN TO_CHAR(b."regex") WHEN (a."properties_type_id" = '9' or a."properties_type_id" = '10') THEN TO_CHAR(b."drop_op") ELSE '' END AS "dropOpValue" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties" a left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties_value" b on a."properties_value_id" = b."id" WHERE (a."model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR (instr( ','||( SELECT "pids" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )||',' , ','||a."model_id"||',')>0)) and a."properties_type_id" not in(5,6,14,15,16) order by a."sort"

SELECT b."drop_arr_obj" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties_value" b ON a."properties_value_id" = b."id" WHERE (a."model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR instr( ','||( SELECT "pids" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )||',' , ','||a."model_id"||',' )>0) AND a."index_id" = #{indexId}

select
from
where "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'|| #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}|| ',%' ) OR instr(','||(SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG("pids") from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%'
))||',',','||"model_id"||',')

(select
,("prop_info") ,'1' As "level" from
where "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
union all (select
,("prop_info") ,'3' As "level" from
where instr( ','||#{pids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||',',','||"model_id"||',' )>0
)
ORDER BY "level","model_id"

SELECT a."index_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties_value" b ON a."properties_value_id" = b."id" WHERE (a."model_id" = #{modelId} OR instr(','||( SELECT "pids" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId} )||',' ,','||a."model_id"||',')>0)
AND b."ganged_field_val" LIKE ( '%'||#{fieldVal}|| '%' )
AND b."ganged_field_val" LIKE ( '%'||#{fieldVal}||',%' )
AND b."ganged_field" = #{fieldIndexId}

select
,"prop_info" from
where "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR instr(','||( SELECT "pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})||',' , ','||"model_id"||',' ) > 0

select ,"prop_info" from where 1 = 1 and "model_id" in
#{item}
select ,"prop_info" from WHERE "model_type_id" = '2' and "delete_flag" = '0'

select
,"prop_info" from
where "delete_flag" = '0'

select
,"prop_info" from
where "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%' AND "delete_flag" = '0' and "model_type_id" = '1') OR instr(','||(SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG("pids") from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%' AND "delete_flag" = '0' and "model_type_id" = '1') and "pids" is not null)||',' , ','||"model_id"||',' ) >0 ORDER BY "model_id"

select
,"prop_info" from
where instr( ','||#{pids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||',' , ','||"model_id"||',') >0 ORDER BY "model_id"

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%' AND "delete_flag" = '0' and "model_type_id" = '1' ) OR (instr(','|| ( SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG("pids") from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%' AND "delete_flag" = '0' and "model_type_id" = '1') and "pids" is not null)||',' , ','||"model_id"||',')>0) ORDER BY "model_id"

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} OR instr(','||( SELECT "pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )||',' , ','||"model_id"||',')>0 ORDER BY "model_id"

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
where "delete_flag" = '0' ORDER BY "model_id"

SELECT
,"prop_info" FROM
WHERE "is_show" = '1' AND "delete_flag" = '0' and "model_level" = '0' AND( "group_nodes" LIKE '%,0,%' or "model_type_id" = '2') AND ("model_view" != '1' or "model_view" != '2')
select count(1) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" where "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT MAX( "model_id" ) AS "modelId" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" <= '500'
mapper.insert:
select AS "modelGroupId" from dual
INSERT INTO ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group"( "model_group_id","model_group_name","is_show","deep","nodes","pid","is_node","group_level","sync_zabbix","network","url","creator","create_date","modifier","modification_date" ) values ( #{modelGroupId}, #{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{syncZabbix,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{network,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )

select AS "instanceId" from dual
insert into ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance"
"instance_id",
"instance_name",
"model_id",
"proxy_id",
"relation_instance_id",
#{instanceId},
#{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proxyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relationInstanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_MW_CMDBMD_PAGEFIELD_TABLE.NEXTVAL AS "id" from dual
insert into ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_pagefield_table"( "id","model_id","prop","label","visible","order_number","type","model_properties_id","is_tree" ) values ( #{id}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelPropertiesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTree,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select:
select
,"prop_info" from
where "is_show" = '1' and("model_id" IN ( SELECT "model_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE ( '%,'|| #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}|| ',%' ) ))

SELECT t."model_id", t."model_name", t."model_desc", t."model_index", t."model_type_id", t."model_group_id", t."model_group_sub_id", t."model_icon", t."is_show", t."deep", t."nodes", t."group_nodes", t."pid", t."pids", t."is_node", t."model_level", t."creator", t."create_date", t."model_view", t."modifier", t."modification_date" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" t WHERE t."delete_flag"='0'
SELECT "model_name" AS "modelName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_id" = #{modelId} AND "delete_flag"='0'
SELECT "model_id" AS "modelId", "model_name"||'('||"model_index"||')' AS "modelName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_type_id" = '2' and "delete_flag"='0'
SELECT "model_id" AS "modelId", "model_index" AS "modelIndex", "model_name" AS "modelName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_type_id" = '1' and "delete_flag"='0'
SELECT "model_id", "model_name", "model_index" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "delete_flag"='0'

SELECT t."model_group_id", CONCAT( 'group_', t."model_group_id" ) AS "modelGroupIdStr", t."model_group_name", N'' AS "modelIndex", t."is_show", t."url" AS "icon", 1 AS "customFlag", (SELECT count( a."instance_id" ) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" b ON a."model_id" = b."model_id" WHERE b."group_nodes" LIKE '%,' || t."model_group_id" || ',%' AND b."delete_flag" = '0' AND b."model_type_id" = '1' AND b."is_show" = '1'
and (a."instance_id" in
#{item} )
) As"instanceNum", t."deep", 0 AS "modelSort", t."nodes", 'group'AS "type", ( CASE WHEN ( INSTR( t."nodes", ',5,' ) > 0 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS "isVim", CONCAT( 'group_', t."pid" ) AS "pidStr", ( CASE WHEN ( INSTR( t."nodes", ',0,' ) > 0 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS "isBase", t."pid", N'' AS "pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" t WHERE 1 = 1 and t."is_show" ='1' and t."model_group_id" != '500'
and (t."model_group_id" in
#{item}
or t."group_level" = '0')
UNION SELECT a."model_id" AS "model_group_id", CONCAT( 'model_', a."model_id" ) AS "modelGroupIdStr", a."model_name" AS "model_group_name", a."model_index" AS "modelIndex", 1 AS "is_show", a."model_icon" AS "icon", a."icon_type" AS "customFlag", ( SELECT count( "instance_id" ) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" WHERE "model_id" = a."model_id"
and ("instance_id" in
#{item} )
) AS "instanceNum", 10 AS "deep", a."model_sort" AS "modelSort", CONCAT(a."group_nodes",a."model_id") AS "nodes", 'model' AS "type", ( CASE WHEN ( INSTR( a."nodes", ',5,' ) > 0 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS "isVim", CONCAT( 'group_', a."model_group_id" ) AS "pidStr", ( CASE WHEN ( INSTR( a."nodes", ',0,' ) > 0 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS "isBase", a."model_group_id" AS "pid", a."pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" a WHERE 1 = 1 and a."delete_flag"='0' and a."is_show" ='1' and a."model_type_id" = '1'
and (a."model_index" in
#{item}
or a."model_level" = '0')

select "model_group_id","model_group_name","is_show","deep","nodes","pid","is_node","group_level","url","creator","create_date","modifier","modification_date" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" where 1=1
and "model_group_name" like '%'||#{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and ("model_group_id" in
#{item}
or "group_level" = '0')

select "model_group_id","model_group_name","is_show","deep","nodes","pid","is_node","url","creator","create_date","modifier","modification_date" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" where "model_group_id"=#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count( 0 ) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "delete_flag"='0' AND "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelGroupId}||',%'
select "model_id" as "modelId","model_index" as "modelIndex" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "nodes" like '%'||#{nodes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
SELECT "model_index" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "group_nodes" LIKE '%,'||#{modelGroupId}||',%' AND "delete_flag"='0' AND "is_show" ='1' and "model_type_id" = '1'
select "instance_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" where "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select "model_index" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "model_id" = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a."instance_id", a."model_id", a."instance_name", c."left_relation" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" b ON a."model_id" = b."model_id" LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations" c on a."model_id"=c."left_model_id" WHERE b."delete_flag"='0' and ${nodes}
select "left_relation" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_relations" where "delete_flag"='0' and "left_model_id"=#{leftModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and "right_model_id"=#{rightModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "delete_flag"='0' and "pids" like '%,'||#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}||',%'
select "properties_type_id" as "propertiesTypeId" ,"properties_type_name" as "propertiesTypeName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_properties_type" order by "properties_type_id"
select count(0) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" where "model_id"=#{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select "model_id" AS "modelId","model_name" AS "modelName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "model_type_id"=2
SELECT "nodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" WHERE "model_group_id" = #{groupId}
SELECT "model_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_index" = #{modelIndex}

(SELECT DISTINCT t."model_group_id", CONCAT( 'group_', t."model_group_id" ) AS "modelGroupIdStr", t."model_group_name", N'' AS "modelIndex", t."is_show", N'' as "icon", (select count( a."instance_id" ) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" a LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" b on a."model_id" = b."model_id" where b."group_nodes" like '%,'||t."model_group_id"||',%' and b."delete_flag"=0 and b."is_show" =1) As"instanceNum", t."deep", 'group' AS "type", CONCAT( 'group_', t."pid" ) AS "pidStr", t."pid", '1' AS "disabled", N'' AS "pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" t LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" a on t."model_group_id" = a."model_group_id" WHERE 1 = 1 and t."is_show" ='1') UNION ( SELECT DISTINCT a."model_id" AS "model_group_id", CONCAT( 'model_', a."model_id" ) AS "modelGroupIdStr", a."model_name" AS "model_group_name", a."model_index" AS "modelIndex", 1 AS "is_show", a."model_icon" AS "icon", ( SELECT count( "instance_id" ) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" WHERE "model_id" = a."model_id" ) AS "instanceNum", 10 AS "deep", 'model' AS "type", CONCAT( 'group_', a."model_group_id" ) AS "pidStr", a."model_group_id" AS "pid", '0' AS "disabled", a."pids" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" a WHERE 1 = 1 and a."delete_flag"=0 and a."is_show" =1 and a."model_type_id" != 2)

select "id", "group_id" as "groupId", "monitor_server_id" AS "monitorServerId", "model_group_id" AS "assetsSubtypeId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_modelgroup_server_mapper" where "group_id" is not null and "monitor_server_id" is not null
and "model_group_id" = #{assetsSubTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t2."user_id" AS "userId", t2."login_name" AS "loginName", t2."user_name" AS "userName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" t2 on t1."user_id" = t2."user_id" where t1."type"='MODEL_MANAGE' and t1."type_id" = TO_CHAR(#{typeId})

select t2."org_id" AS "orgId", t2."org_name" AS "orgName", t2."nodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t2 on t1."org_id" = t2."org_id" where t1."type"='MODEL_MANAGE' and t1."type_id" = TO_CHAR(#{typeId})

select t1."group_id" AS "groupId", t2."group_name" AS "groupName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_mapper" t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_table" t2 on t1."group_id" = t2."group_id" where t1."type"='MODEL_MANAGE' and t1."type_id" = TO_CHAR(#{typeId})
select "group_id" AS "groupId","monitor_server_id" AS "monitorServerId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_modelgroup_server_mapper" where "model_group_id" =#{modelGroupId}
SELECT "model_group_id" AS "groupId" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group" WHERE "model_group_name" = #{name}
select "model_group_id" AS "groupId","model_group_name" AS "groupName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_group"
select "model_index" AS "modelIndex","group_nodes" AS "groupNodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "delete_flag"='0'
SELECT "group_nodes" AS "groupNodes", "model_index" AS "modelIndex" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "delete_flag"='0'

update.foreach: UPDATE ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_customcol_table" a SET a."order_number" = #{updateList.sort} WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM "mw_cmdbmd_pagefield_table" b WHERE b."id" = a."col_id" AND b."prop" = #{updateList.indexId} AND b."model_id" = #{updateList.modelId} )

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_customcol_table" a WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_pagefield_table" b WHERE b."id" = a."col_id" AND b."model_id" = #{modelId})
mapper.select:
SELECT t1."instance_id" AS "modelInstanceId", t1."instance_name" AS "instanceName", t2."model_icon" as "url", t2."icon_type" AS "customFlag" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" t2 on t1."model_id" = t2."model_id" where t1."instance_id" in
#{item}

SELECT "model_index" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" where "model_id" in
#{item}

select t1."instance_id" AS "modelInstanceId", t1."instance_name" AS "modelInstanceName", t1."relation_instance_id" AS "relationInstanceId", t2."group_nodes" AS "groupNodes", t2."model_group_id" AS "groupId", t2."model_id" AS "modelId", t2."model_index" AS "modelIndex" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_instance" t1 LEFT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" t2 ON t1."model_id" = t2."model_id" where t2."delete_flag" = '0' and t2."is_show" = '1'
select t2."model_id" AS "modelId", t2."model_index" AS "modelIndex" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" t2 where t2."delete_flag" = '0' and t2."model_type_id" = '1'
SELECT "model_index" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_view" = '2' AND "delete_flag" = '0' AND "model_type_id" = '1'
SELECT "model_index" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_cmdbmd_manage" WHERE "model_view" = '1' AND "delete_flag" = '0' AND "model_type_id" = '1'
